thread.title: Vivette Springett
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Vivette Springett

author: Vivette Springett
title: Vivette Springett
text: I was in bebt I didn't know what to do to where to go. I saw your add in the paper and decided to call. I went in and talk with Rhoda. She point me in the right direction and she helped me every step of the way. Thank you.
